nodes.bodyText:
Do we need this in the TestUtils class?
I already see we have it in the TextAnalyticsClientBuilderTest class
I can keep it here and remove AZURE_TEXT_ANALYTICS_API_KEY from TextAnalyticsClientBuilderTest
But it's used in the Builder, why should we remove it from there. Also, I see that is it used only in one place, do we need it as a constant then?
offline discussion. Keep it here in TextUtil.
